001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import java.time.Duration;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
006
007import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest;
008import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
009
010public class CompatClient implements ApiHttpClient {
011    private final ApiHttpClient client;
012    private final String projectKey;
013
014    private CompatClient(final ApiHttpClient client, final String projectKey) {
015        this.client = client;
016        this.projectKey = projectKey;
017    }
018
019    public static CompatClient of(final ApiHttpClient client, final String projectKey) {
020        return new CompatClient(client, projectKey);
021    }
022
023    public <O, TO> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final SphereRequest<TO> request,
024            final Class<O> outputType) {
025        final CompatRequest<O> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, request, outputType);
026        return compatRequest.execute(client);
027    }
028
029    public <O, TO> ApiHttpResponse<O> executeBlocking(final SphereRequest<TO> request, final Class<O> outputType) {
030        final CompatRequest<O> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, request, outputType);
031        return compatRequest.executeBlocking(client);
032    }
033
034    public <O, TO> ApiHttpResponse<O> executeBlocking(final SphereRequest<TO> request, final Class<O> outputType,
035            Duration duration) {
036        final CompatRequest<O> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, request, outputType);
037        return compatRequest.executeBlocking(client, duration);
038    }
039
040    @Override
041    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request, Class<O> outputType) {
042        return client.execute(request, outputType);
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ClientRequestCommand<O> method) {
047        return client.execute(method);
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public ResponseSerializer getSerializerService() {
052        return client.getSerializerService();
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
057        return client.execute(request);
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public void close() throws Exception {
062        client.close();
063    }
064}
